inclusion.criterion: The probing depth (PD) of the surgical sites in the both group ranged from 5 to 8 mm.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The clinical attachment level (CAL) at the surgical sites in both the group ranged from 5 to 9 mm.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Quadrant with the presence of atleast 6 teeth will be selected for study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Tobacco in any form and alcoholics.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of systemic ailments, patients under ant-inflammatory/antibiotic 3 months prior to recruitment for study.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who had received periodontal treatment within the previous 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient who have history of intolerance or hypersensitivity to Diclofenac and with gastric diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She has generalized moderate/severe chronic periodontitis, which makes her eligible for the study.
